dct_description_sm: Circular world map in cordiform projection; with decorated borders possibly designed by Adriaen Collaert. "It seems likely that on his return from London to Amsterdam in 1593 Hondius took the original circular map plates with him and reissued the world map ... within the newly provided border."--Shirley, R. The mapping of the world.
